page.title: 18Social Concerns
page.content: Many of the people who live in our area are part of an old established farming community.The matters which concern them and their attitudes to things are to do mainly with keeping the beauty and peace of the surrounding area intact. Most social concern expressed would be about new buildings which would affect the life of one,or more than one member of the community. There has been some controversy recently,reported in the local newspaper,about a barn which had been erected without the necessary planning permission.This barn was erected in Bromsash to be used for the intensive rearing of calves.A Department of the Environment inspector has ruled that the barn must be demolished.
